title: The Pizza Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This pizzeria offers a vegan pizza, has vegan cheese, a gluten-free crust. Toppings include organic and locally grown veggies plus fruit, olives, cashew, and roasted pine nuts. Has a vegan soup, organic garden salad, vegan organic beer. Salad dressing is made in-house. The outside deck overlooks the Nehalem river.
